title: Reserve 30 SL Carbon Trail Wheels go Super Light at 1750g w/ i9 Hydra Hubs
content:
Reserve Wheels have updated their 30mm carbon rims, releasing an all-new Super Light Wheelset for trail riding, weighing a claimed 1750g. Just like the Reserve 28 XC wheels launched last month, the Reserve 30 SL have no rider weight limit, and come with Reserve’s Lifetime Warranty; no questions asked, replaced for free. Here’s the tech. […]

The post Reserve 30 SL Carbon Trail Wheels go Super Light at 1750g w/ i9 Hydra Hubs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
